name: NewColony
description:
Survival game set on another planet, as it stands right now it is very basic and boring however it is under development and will have more content (likely not much more) soon.

Most assets are going to be replaced however i'm not sure when.

Finally a huge apology for the horrendous floor texture. 

Controls:

"wasd" to move

"Mouse" to aim

"LMB" to interact (break, make NPC follow you, assign job to NPC, etc... )

"enter" to place

"RMB" to cancel purchase

"M" for map

"LMB" in map to place a marker
